    Why audit your App?

    Nobody is perfect an it‚Äôs sometimes very complicated to detect some issues because Apple/Xcode is not checking everything.

    Development environment

    Xcode minimal version

    ‚úÖ Apple, is publishing each year a date to use a minimal version of Xcode
    ‚úÖ AppScan Audit, is checking this

    Service urls (universal links, credentials, env url traces)

    ‚ùå Apple is not checking anything
    ‚úÖ AppScan Audit, is the universal links configuration and url traces

    App configuration

    ‚ùå Apple is checking only some Apple features
    ‚úÖ AppScan is checking App configuration, private, public & custom keys

    App Resources

    App Size

    ‚ùå Apple is not chekcing anything
    ‚úÖ AppScan helps you to find some App optmiziations

    Images

    ‚úÖ Apple is something adding your some warnings about images
    ‚úÖ AppScan is checking images, missing assets, languages support, third party librairi

    Languages

    ‚ùå Apple is not checking the missing values/keys
    ‚úÖ AppScan is checking this

    Librairies

    ‚ùå Apple is not checking the external librairies
    ‚úÖ AppScan is checking this vitality of each library & the licences

    Security

    ‚ùå Apple is doing a very light control
    ‚úÖ AppScan is checking is some files are potentially risked, if some configurations are risky.
